title: I've made a huge mistake. Is there any possible way to undo this?

embed.description: Ranked 5v5 teams are available during scheduled windows per region. Servers with Ranked 3v3 enabled will also be available during that time. Click here to view the schedule. As a grizzled veteran o...

body:
I disbanded a ranked team today as the Captain in order to join another ranked team. At the time I did it, I thought I would be able to make the same ranked team at a later time. However, I googled around and found that "WHAT HAPPENS TO DISBANDED TEAMS?" -> "If the team was ranked: The team will never be fully deleted. No one can ever use the name or tag." BUT I also saw that, "Please note: Ranked teams that have been disbanded will never be deleted through an automatic system. However, we will mass delete disbanded teams that have been disbanded for more than 90 days."

I really like our team name. So even if I wait 90 days, I would not be able to get our "team name/tag" back? Is there any way to get the name back at all?

replies.body:
I recommend reaching out to our specialists in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) about this since I'm unable to find any immediate information regarding this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
